SHARON McAULIFFE TAKES THE OATH AS COUNCIL PRESIDENT

LIZBETH DeJESUS TAKES THE OATH AS COUNCIL VICE-PRESIDENT

SHARON McAULIFFE, 1ST WARD

VIRBHADRA PATEL, 4TH WARD

HOWIE BAUER, 2ND WARD

DEBBIE MEEHAN, 5TH WARD

CORY SPILLAR, 3RD WARD

DANIEL HARRIS, AT-LARGE

Anyone who attends a Council Meeting / Work Session who requires use of the Phonic Ear Assistive Listening Device is asked to notify the Municipal Clerk's Office no later than 3PM on the day of the meeting.

The Municipal Council, as authorized by Chapter 4, Article 2:4-5 of the Revised Ordinances of the Township of Woodbridge shall constitute the authority to administer the issuance of licenses and to enforce state statutes and regulations and Local Ordinances relating to alcoholic beverage control. The Municipal Council shall have the authority to afford a hearing if and when there is a need for such action. John M. Mitch, RMC / CMC / CMR Municipal Clerk
